segments.text: Looking at this kitchen, everything seems so ordinary at first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is busy with dishes, her back to the room.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is running from the faucet, filling the sink to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's spilling over onto the floor, making a big mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing right there, oblivious to it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are up to no good with that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretched out on that shaky stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he'll come tumbling down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting, her eyes full of expectation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end so badly with the wet floor and all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would notice before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window shows a nice garden, but inside it's a disaster waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not hear the water splashing?
segments.speaker: PAR
